title: WTB Cobb Bat Off Shoulder (graded, not raw)
author: Moose117

posts.post_title: WTB Cobb Bat Off Shoulder (graded, not raw)
posts.post_content:
Looking for the Ty Cobb bat off shoulder.
Low grade is fine, as long as its got decent eye appeal.
Sweet Caporal is my least favorite back, so I'd prefer it be something else, if possible.
Paypal goods is my method of payment.
Thanks for looking!
